comments: If A_n is the n X n matrix a(i,j)=min(prime(i), prime(j)) then det(M_n)/det(A_n)=prime(n)/2
formula: Let M_n be the n X n matrix m(i, j)=Max(prime(i), prime(j)); then a(n)=(-1)^(n+1)*det(M_n). - _Benoit Cloitre_, May 11 2002
author: Armand Turpel (armandt(AT)unforgettable.com)
extensions: Corrected and extended by Larry Reeves (larryr(AT)acm.org), Sep 27 2000
